explanation: [0-0] Two young girls stand in a room with exposed white pipes and wood paneling. There are several mirrors in the background. The girls are wearing matching black crop tops and pants. The girl on the left is wearing glasses. There is a round gray stool in front of the camera. In the middle of the screen is the caption "hot boy".

[0-5] The two girls walk towards the camera. The girl on the right puts on sunglasses. Then, they both tap the stool in front of the camera, make a "six" gesture with their hands, and step back. The caption in the middle of the screen changes to "funny boy" with a small flame icon beside it.
